review_data.title: Loved it!
review_data.content: This is a fun thing to do - you drive through Zurich while eating fondue. The tour takes two hours and you should buy your ticket well in advance. It’s a bit kitsch but fun. Great thing to do if you visitors from abroad.

review_data.title: Special evening
review_data.content: I booked the FondueTram as a Valentine surprise and we really enjoyed it: of course it’s one in its kind. Atmosphere is lovely, food is ok, you’ll get better and more at most normal restaurants but the setting makes up for it. The service was...More

review_data.title: Romantic - a must do
review_data.content: dcrusing throughh zurich center during xmas time on an old tramway that is a fondue restaurant is one of the most romantic things you can do with your partner or family. Chesse fondue is excellent, wine delicious and atmosphere unbeatable.

review_data.title: Fondue is outstanding but get there early
review_data.content: The fondue itself was wonderful and the tour of the city was outstanding in the lights (be sure and go at night). The service was good. However, we arrived what we thought was on time at 15 minutes before the leaving time per the tickets....More

review_data.title: Da non rifare
review_data.content: Una fondue che per i miei gusti lascia molto a desiderare, la nostra hanno dovuto addirittura cambiarla a metà percorso...More

review_data.title: Sightseeing mit Fondue
review_data.content: Originelle Idee, Fondue serviert in einem fahrenden Tram inklusive Altstadtkulisse. Gut gemeinter Tipp: Danach sich selber und die Kleider auslüften,...More

review_data.title: just delightful
review_data.content: its just a kitsch romantic expirience through zurich in an Tram from 1929 christmaslight and fondue go very well together.. service was Good and so was the food but really its about the expirience and the jealous faces at the windows

review_data.title: Nostalgie Fondue Plausch
review_data.content: We went here for the event... sure not for get best location or best food. Is good for happy evening with friends even if there are from Asia. The old tram and the fondue is great... our staff was great. We will recommend this event

review_data.title: Kulinarik und Stadtbesichtigung in Einem
review_data.content: Im Oldtimertram die Stadt besichtigen und dazu das typische Schweizer Wintergericht geniessen. Vielleicht erzählt der Tramführer etwas über die Eigenheiten...More

review_data.title: Vivez Suisse pendant deux heures
review_data.content: Le cadre est idéalement nostalgique, le confort "d'époque" avec ses banquettes en bois ne nuit pas au service même lorsqu'on...More

review_data.title: un paseo por Zürich para recordar que termina con la fondue.
review_data.content: La Fondue Tranvía es excelente, un paseo por Zürich para recordar que termina con la fondue. El lugar no es...More

review_data.title: Geburtstagsgeschenk
review_data.content: Vorab es war ein gelungener Abend. Ich war enttäuscht dass die Getränke zusätzlich verrechnet wurden. So wurde das ganze sehr...More

review_data.title: Niemals
review_data.content: Absolute Katastrophe. Noch nie so unfreundlichen Service erlebt. Keine Begrüssung, konnte Bedingungen überhaupt reden.? Keine Informationen über die Fahrt Essen...More

review_data.title: Très sympa et romantique
review_data.content: Le prix est un peu élevé, mais c'est quand même un restaurant ambulant dans un tram, avec pas beaucoup de...More

review_data.title: Schöner Winterabend!
review_data.content: Wir waren zu viert im Fonduetram. Hatten einen schönen Abend. Feines Fondue, guter Service und feiner Weisswein! Ein gutes, eingespieltes...More

review_data.title: surprisingly good
review_data.content: We've booked the fondue tram around two month ago - knowing the queue will be large (and it was). Booked in November, we got a free spot for the 2. Jan. Booked a table for four - SFr 93 each - outch!!!! (2 adults -...More

review_data.title: If you like Zurich and enjoy fondue, this is a must!
review_data.content: The fondue tram runs every winter and is a great way to see the sights of Zurich; whilst enjoying an excellent fondue meal. It runs from late October through to March, with two tours per evening. The number of days that the tour runs increases...More

review_data.title: Fondue Tram Zürich
review_data.content: The Fondue you have in the Fondue Tram in Zürich ist excellent - I can say that, because I am a native Swiss. You have a very nice ride through Zürich end enjoy your Fondue. It is not cheap, but very nice and worth it....More

review_data.title: War O.K.
review_data.content: Das Fonduetram ist eine witzige Idee. Wenn man jedoch schon 1000 Mal Strassenbahn gefahren ist und auch schon woanders ein...More
